question: The vending machines sell cookies for 75 cents and crackers for 110 cents. Michael spent €14 and got 6 bags of cookies and had 5% of his money left in change. How many crackers did he buy?
answer:
Michael got €0.7 in change because €14*5/100 = <<14*5/100=0.7>>0.7
Michael spent €13.3 because 14 - 0.7 = <<14-0.7=13.3>>13.3
Michael spent €4.5 on cookies because 6*0.75 = <<6*0.75=4.5>>4.5
Michael spent 8.8 on crackers because 13.3 - 4.5 = <<13.3-4.5=8.8>>8.8
Michael bought 8 crackers because 8.8 / 1.1 = <<8=8>>8
#### 8
